title:
A Hamiltonian structure of Timoshenko beam under finite and dynamic
  three-dimensional transformations
authors: Cosserat Oscar and Le Marrec, Lo\"ic
abstract:
We study Timoshenko model and compare various approaches, namely euclidean
and material coordinates. We provide a concise proof of energy conservation, a
variational proof of equilibrium equations and a Hamiltonian structure
delivering the equations of motion. This work is still in progress.
